name: Egypto
startIntroPart1: Ahmos the great leader and the liberator of Egypt from Huxus is welcoming you as his successor.
startIntroPart2: Will you be able to fulfill the prophecy and make us number one Civilization?
declaringWar: Time to erase you from the earth
defeated: One day I will be back and you will be burried alive
introduction: Ahmos the king welcomes you and sees you as friend till you prove otherwise
uniqueText: It has some advantages but not that much advantages!
uniques: Receive [10] free [Great Scientist] when you discover [Writing]
Receive [10] free [Chariot Archer] when you discover [Horseback Riding]
Receive [1] free [Great Engineer] when you discover [Construction]
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
Great General provides double combat bonus
[+100]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]
[+100]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital
[-25]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
When conquering an encampment, earn [100] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [50]% chance>
When defeating a [{Barbarian} {Water}] unit, earn [100] Gold and recruit it <with [50]% chance>
[+5 Science] from every specialist [in all cities]
Receive a tech boost when scientific buildings/wonders are built in capital
All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.
Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Military Units gifted from City-States start with [+100] XP
200 Gold for discovering a Natural Wonder (bonus enhanced to 500 Gold if first to discover it)
[+1 Happiness] for every known Natural Wonder
Receive triple Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities
Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills
No Maintenance costs for improvements in [Hill] tiles
[1] Movement point cost to disembark <for [All] units>
Retain [50]% of the happiness from a luxury after the last copy has been traded away
Gain [120] Influence with a [Great Person] gift to a City-State
When declaring friendship, both parties gain a [10]% boost to great person generation
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [20] turns.
Gain a free [Harbor] [in all coastal cities]
Land units may cross [Mountain] tiles after the first [Great General] is earned
Units ending their turn on [Mountain] tiles take [30] damage
May choose [2] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
[+1 Faith] [in all cities] <with [1] to [2] neighboring [unimproved] [Forest] tiles>
[+2 Faith] [in all cities] <with [3] to [6] neighboring [unimproved] [Forest] tiles>
[+20]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
Receive a free Great Person at the end of every [Maya Long Count calendar cycle] (every 394 years), after researching [Theology]. Each bonus person can only be chosen once.
